response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $115. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product worth $120 at a reasonable discount.
